hero.title: Simplify Your Class Scheduling
hero.subtitle: The all-in-one platform for fitness instructors, yoga teachers, and wellness coaches to manage classes, bookings, and participants.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful tools designed for individual instructors

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.description: Create recurring classes with flexible scheduling. Set weekly, bi-weekly, or custom patterns.

bookings.title: Easy Bookings
bookings.description: Participants book instantly via your personal link. Automatic waitlist management included.

attendance.title: Attendance Tracking
attendance.description: Mark attendance with one tap. Track no-shows and analyze class performance.

calendar.title: Calendar View
calendar.description: See all your classes at a glance. Drag and drop to reschedule.

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.description: Automatic reminders for participants. Instant alerts for cancellations.

profile.title: Public Profile
profile.description: Your own branded page to showcase classes and accept bookings.

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Set up your instructor profile with your bio, activity type, and booking link.

step2.title: Add Your Classes
step2.description: Create classes with details, capacity limits, and recurring schedules.

step3.title: Share & Book
step3.description: Share your profile link. Participants book directly, you manage everything.

cta.title: Ready to Simplify Your Teaching?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of instructors who save hours every week with ClassOps.

contact.title: Contact Us
